brief_title: A Phase 1/2 Study of VX-522 in Participants With Cystic Fibrosis (CF)
official_title: A Phase 1/2 Dose Escalation Study Evaluating the Safety, and Tolerability and Efficacy of VX-522 in Subjects 18 Years of Age and Older With Cystic Fibrosis and a CFTR Genotype Not Responsive to CFTR Modulator Therapy
brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety, and tolerability and efficacy of VX-522 in participants 18 years of age and older with cystic fibrosis and a cystic fibrosis transmembrane conductance regulator (CFTR) genotype not responsive to CFTR modulator therapy.
